overview: Developer Tsang Siu-Chi and his agent have bought two of a group of four properties. Rival developer, Boss Hung has secured the other two properties. Both aim to buy all four so they can knock them down and build hotels.

production_companies.name: Yin Aau Gaai Mong Ngo Daai Movie Limited Company
Regal Films Distribution Co., Ltd. (Hong Kong)

title: The Banquet
